Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: http://i.imgur.com/kVxAwL1.png
an opulently appointed courtyard

Despite the heat of the desert sun,Dimly lit by the soft glow of oil lanterns, this opulently decorated walled courtyard is a cool respite. Overflowing with an astounding number of plants and flowering trees despite the arid desert setting outside the walls, the space seems almost tropical. A large canopied pool dominates the center of the space, filled with floating lilies and a decorative lotus flower fountain. A large veranda overlooks the courtyard from the second floor to the west. A meticulously laid sandstone brick walkway circles through the area, passing by intimate seating areas situated beneath colorful awnings. The overpoweringly sweet scent of overripe fruits and delicate blooms pervades your senses.

Despite the heat of the desert sun,Dimly lit by the soft glow of oil lanterns, this opulently decorated walled courtyard is cool respite. Overflowing with an astounding number of plants and flowering trees despite the arid desert setting outside the walls, the space seems almost tropical. A large canopied pool dominates the center of the space, filled with floating lilies and a decorative lotus flower fountain. A large veranda overlooks the courtyard from the second floor to the west.

Despite the heat of the desert sun,Dimly lit by the soft glow of oil lanterns, this opulently decorated walled courtyard is a cool respite. Overflowing with an astounding number of plants and flowering trees despite the arid desert setting outside the walls, the space seems almost tropical. A large canopied pool dominates the center of the space, filled with floating lilies and a decorative lotus flower fountain. A large veranda overlooks the courtyard from the second floor to the west. A meticulously laid sandstone brick walkway circles through the area, passing by intimate seating areas situated beneath colorful awnings. The overpoweringly sweet scent of overripe fruits and delicate blooms pervades your senses.
the nearest arch

The pointed arch in the northern wall is hung with ivory curtains, sheer enough to afford tiny peeks into the open-air entryway beyond. Subtle breezes cause the curtains to stir and sway in fluid motion.
Hung with a sheer ivory curtain, the pointed arch leads into an open-air entryway.
a small, heavily guarded arch leading west
Heavily guarded by a pair of silent, stoic slaves, the small arch is curtained in heavy fabrics.
a large, pointed arch on the veranda
A large, curtained arch, rising to a point leads west into the bedroom from the private veranda.
the pointed arches in the northern wall
The pointed arches in the northern wall are hung with ivory curtains, sheer enough to afford tiny peeks into the courtyard beyond. Subtle breezes cause the curtains to stir and sway in fluid motion.
Hung with sheer ivory curtains, the pointed arches in the northern wall lead out into a courtyard area.
an ever-present cooling breeze
It's a breeze. You can't see a breeze. Look at the curtains waving instead. So mesmerizing...
a silken canopy over a small seating area
One of many canopies protecting the courtyard from the harsh desert sun.
a canopy over the large pool
A large white canopy covers the pool, protecting it from the hot sun of the day.
a chaise for one
A small chaise suitable for one person.
a double chaise lounge
A chaise lounge large enough to comfortably seat two.
the northeastern corner of the courtyard
The northeastern corner of the courtyard.
the northwestern corner of the courtyard
The northwestern corner of the courtyard.
the southeastern corner of the courtyard
The southeastern corner of the courtyard.
the southwestern corner of the courtyard
The southwestern corner of the courtyard.
the corners of the courtyard
The corners of the courtyard.
the sheer ivory curtains
Sheer ivory curtains blur the view into the open-air entryway through the pointed arches in the north wall. Subtle breezes cause the curtains to stir and sway in fluid motion.
Sheer ivory curtains blur the view into the open-air entryway through the pointed arches in the north wall.
the multitudinous and fragrant blooms in the courtyard
A multitudinous array of fragrant floral blooms fill the courtyard with a vibrant scent.
a large lotus flower fountain
A large marble lotus flower stands in the center of the pool, water trickling softly from within the center to spatter down into the pool with a merry sound.
the ground
The ground beneath your feet.
The ground beneath your feet.
two stoic, silent guards
Muscular, silent guards flank the small arch in the western wall, stoically standing without moving an inch. They are wearing the collars of slaves.
the scorching heatresidual heat from the day
The heat is sweltering and overwhelming.slowly waning with the cool of night.
a handful of oil lamps throughout the courtyard
A handful of small oil lamps are scattered throughout the courtyard, lending light when the night has fallen.
the scorching sunluminous moon

Base:Description.midnight: The moon sits high at the apex of the sky, indicating the midnight hour.
Base:Description.aftermidnight: It is after midnight, the moon beginning the slow descent toward the western horizon.
Base:Description.dawn: The sun peeks over the eastern horizon, indicating the arrival of dawn.
Base:Description.morning: The sun climbs higher in the eastern sky as morning progresses toward midday.
Base:Description.midday: The sun sits high at the apex of the sky.
Base:Description.afternoon: The sun begins its descent toward the western horizon.
Base:Description.dusk: The rays of the sun slant low over the land as sunset approaches.
Base:Description.evening: The moon begins climbing up the eastern half of the sky.

Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: the middle of the area
The middle of the area.
The middle of the area.
a large, shallow pool
A raised pool, with a broad edge and a lotus-flower fountain.
the broad stone edge of the pool
Large flat stones cap the walls of the pool, broad enough to provide a comfortable sitting spot.
the railing of the veranda
A wide stone railing surrounding the veranda.
the sand
Some fine, silty sand.
the shade of a canopy
The canopies overheard provide cool, soothing shady retreats from the sun.
the bluestar-studded sky overhead
The bluestar-studded sky overhead is clear and cloudless.
The bluestar-studded sky overhead is clear and cloudless.
a low table between two chaise lounges
A small, round table situated between two chaise lounges.
the exotic fruit trees surrounding the courtyard
A number of exotic fruit trees surround the courtyard, bearing a number of ripe and over-ripe fruits.
a veranda overlooking the courtyard
A wide, circular veranda overlooking the tropical courtyard.
the eastern wall of the courtyard
The eastern wall of the courtyard.
the northern wall of the courtyard
The northern wall of the courtyard.
the southern wall of the courtyard
The southern wall of the courtyard.
the western wall of the courtyard
The western wall of the courtyard.
the walls of the courtyard
Tall adobe walls surround the courtyard on all sides.
the cool water in the canopied pool
The pool is filled with cool water, protected from the harsh sun overhead by a white canopy.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] \{ \ \{ A peel of soft, muffled giggling can be heard in the distance. \| A pair of women dressed in lush, colorful robes slowly pass through the courtyard, softly murmuring to one another before disappearing into the heavily guarded curtain in the western wall. \| A slave man in a simple loincloth pads through the area, sweeping at the ground and checking the wicks of the oil lanterns before disappearing again. \| A slim slave girl in simple dress hurries through the area with a large platter of \{ fruits \| meats \| tea glasses \| bowls \| foods \} on her head, disappearing into the guarded archway before quickly reappearing with an empty tray and returning to the palace. \| A female voice raised in song can be heard muffled in the distance, finger cymbals occasionally ringing out before the music fades away. \| The cloudless, starlit sky above casts a dim, luminescent glow over the area. \| The air around you is cool in the dim moonglow of midnight. \| The air is still in the dark of night, the luminescent glow of the night sky casting dark shadows all around. \| The stars above twinkle in the dark indigo of the night sky. \} \ \ \{ The rose-gold hue of dawn kisses the eastern horizon. \| The slowly rising sun washes the land in a rosy-golden light. \} \ \ \{ A small group of women in lush, colorful robes enters into the courtyard, laughing merrily with one another as they swish through the area and disappear behind the guard archway. \| A lone woman in opulent \{ gold \| azure \| burgundy \| black \| white \| rosy-gold \} silk robes enters through the well guarded arch, giving you a wary glance over her face veil as she hurries out into the entryway. \| A pair of women that appear to be twins steps into the courtyard, resting briefly together on the edge of the pool before rising again and disappearing into the guarded arch in the west wall. \| A slave man in simple dress enters through the entryway, briefly tidying up the courtyard before quickly hurrying away. \| A slim slave girl in simple dress hurries through the area with a large platter of \{ fruits \| meats \| tea glasses \| bowls \| foods \} on her head, disappearing into the guarded archway before quickly reappearing with an empty tray and returning to the palace. \| The sun bears down from overhead, oppressively hot and burning. \| The oppressive heat surrounds your body as the scorching sun proceeds through the sky \| The oppressive heat of the day seems to radiate from all around. \| The cloying heat of the day is oppressive and stifling, the sun beating down in shimmering waves. \} \ \ \{ The sun dips lower toward the western horizon as the light shifts to a deeper red hue with the approach of sunset. \| The western sky is painted in strokes of burgundy and gold as dusk slowly approaches. \} \ \}
X[M] EmitIn(\$this, "You catch the muffled sound of the evening bell."); return TRUE;
X[M] EmitIn(\$this, "The deep sound of midday bells is heard from outside."); return TRUE;
X[M] EmitIn(\$this, "Outside, the bells announce midnight."); return TRUE;
X[M] EmitIn(\$this, "The church bells herald the morning."); return TRUE;
